meanings.sent1: The oomiacks carried many people across the icy waters.
meanings.sent2: The villagers used the oomiacks to travel to different islands.
meanings.sent3: The oomiacks were so big, they could fit all the supplies for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The oomiacks glided gracefully through the frigid sea like giant swans.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the oomiacks bobbing on the waves was both majestic and practical.

meanings.sent1: The explorers marveled at the collection of oomiacks displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: In the exhibit, there were many oomiacks from different regions.
meanings.sent3: The oomiacks on the shelf looked like a row of miniature canoes.
meanings.sent4: The oomiacks in the room seemed to whisper stories of distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The variety of oomiacks showcased the diversity of Inuit craftsmanship.
